com.mapgroup.client

Class TreeClient.MailPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.mapgroup.client.TreeClient.MailPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Enclosing class:
    TreeClient

    public class TreeClient.MailPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Provides all the services to send an email to one or many addressees with the report of the last prediction.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Returns:
